title: Odimalai mIdamarum
sahitya:
Odimalai mIdamarum nAthan murugEsanadu pAda prasAdam adanai pENip-peru manamE


anupallavi

  shOdanaiyAl sOrum pOdu vEdanaiyAl vADum pOdu nAthan avan tirunAmam OduvAi uyyavE nI


caraNam    pallAyiram bhaktaraip-pAlittu AtkoLvOn ellAm vallavan irakkam uLLavan
pollAda Uzhvinai tollayaDutta pOdum nillAdu ODi viDum nI murugA enradum
